page.title: 15A Dundrennan Shepherd
page.content: My dad gets up at 4.45am and feeds calves. Then he feeds tups ewes and lambs.He gathers sheep to check they're alright,then gives men there orders.He gets breakfast at ten past eight.He tells his boss what we need for the farm.He looks around the farm to see what other jobs are to be done then he has dinner at l o'clock.He starts feeding stock again.This is routine except on market days.If he has to go away on farm business his son looks after the farm.He trains dogs before tea.Then we go fishing or shooting rabbits.
